00009 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00010 struct to_python_value< ndarray::EigenView<T,N,C> const & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00011     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::EigenView<T,N,C> const & x) const {
00012         to_python_value< ndarray::Array<T,N,C> const &> array_to_python;
00013         try {
00014             numpy::ndarray array(python::detail::new_reference(array_to_python(x.getArray())));
00015             numpy::matrix matrix(array, array.get_dtype(), false);
00016             Py_INCREF(matrix.ptr());
00017             return matrix.ptr();
00018         } catch (error_already_set & err) {
00019             handle_exception();
00020             return NULL;
00021         }
00022     }
00023     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00024         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::matrix>::get_pytype();
00025     }
00026 };
00027 
00028 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00029 struct to_python_value< ndarray::EigenView<T,N,C> & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00030     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::EigenView<T,N,C> & x) const {
00031         return to_python_value< ndarray::EigenView<T,N,C> const & >()(x);
00032     }
00033     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00034         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::matrix>::get_pytype();
00035     }
